page.title: 19A DAY AT THE MAGNUM
page.content: Let us suppose a typical family of mother ,father and two children went to the{Magnum Leisure Centre for 1 {day. } {THEIR EXPENDITURE. Bus fare (adults)=2x36p=72p Bus fare (children)=2x18p=36p Entrance fee(adults)=2x25p=50p Entrance fee (children)=2x20p=40p Swimming (adults)=2x35p=70p Swimming (children)=2x30p=60p Two cups of tea =2x20p=40p Two cups of juice =2x25p=50p Four packets of crisps =4x14p=56p {___________________________________ TOTAL COST Â£4.74 {____________________________________}
